name: Jigsaw Puzzle Mozaic game
description:
Dear Puzzlers’ lovers,
We invite all the family to enjoy their new challenging Jigsaw Puzzle free Mozaic game :
Choose your favourite Image, then select your level, let’s start !
Relax when stimulating your mind with colorful puzzle mozaic game.
Your mozaic image is placed inside the huge pool : decorate your swimming pool with colorful tiles and make it become awesome.

Features :

From 9 pieces to 53 pieces Jigsaw puzzles to play different levels
100 pictures for all the family
Timer is available for more challenge
15 kinds of tiles to decorate your pool.
10 Backgrounds sounds effects you can match with your mozaic image context : underwater, in forest, with birds, and more.

All family love to play jigsaw puzzle mozaic game.
Young player may match background sounds effects with picture mozaic image for more fun.
Enjoy the puzzle game daily, relaxing, stimulating your brains in family !
